mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran ( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.update: update tbl_tran set stage = #{stage}, editBy = #{editBy}, editTime = #{editTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) as value,
stage as name
from tbl_tran
group by stage

select count(*) from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id join tbl_customer cus on t.customerId = cus.id
u.name like '%' ${owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and con.name like '%' #{contactsName} '%'

from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id join tbl_customer cus on t.customerId = cus.id
u.name like '%' ${owner} '%'
